Author: xStingx
Text: Gradually reduce your amount. Try not to cut all at once. I did the same when I went on Vacation for a week and it was hard coming back to revert. What helps is I bought tons of fruit and filled up on apples, oranges, banana and low cal snacks. The trick here is that your body is hungry but the hunger will subside after you fill it. So fill it with fruits. You can eat tons and not feel ashamed. I ended up losing the weight plus more when I did this.
